thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Mary W
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Mary W

author: Mary W
title: Mary W
text:
Just received my Venetian Glass Frog Earrings I
could not be more thrilled & I am so excited! They are absolutely
Exquisite. The detail &
coloring description on line could not be any more
authentic. The only problem I am having is, they are a late
April Birthday gift, HOW am I going to keep them from her that
long? Thnks for the rapid response in email confirmation &
delivery. Definitely customer for life!
